languages.text: "Ты видела лишь один агромир, притом довольно запущенный, и решила, что весь Империум подобен ему? Комичное суждение".
"You have seen one agri-world, and a dilapidated one at that, and you have extrapolated from this single data point to reach an assessment of the entire Imperium? A ridiculous syllogism."
languages.original_text: "Ты видела лишь один агромир, притом довольно запущенный, и решила, что весь Империум подобен ему? Комичное суждение".

traits.locale_text: "You have seen one agri-world, and a dilapidated one at that, and you have extrapolated from this single data point to reach an assessment of the entire Imperium? A ridiculous syllogism."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You have seen one agri-world, and a dilapidated one at that, and you have extrapolated from this single data point to reach an assessment of the entire Imperium? A ridiculous syllogism."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You have seen one agri-world, and a dilapidated one at that, and you have extrapolated from this single data point to reach an assessment of the entire Imperium? A ridiculous syllogism."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You have seen one agri-world, and a dilapidated one at that, and you have extrapolated from this single data point to reach an assessment of the entire Imperium? A ridiculous syllogism."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “你只见过一个农业世界，而且还是个残破不堪的农业世界。你打算基于这单一的数据，便妄加推断整个帝国的情况吗？何等荒谬的论证。”
languages.original_text: "You have seen one agri-world, and a dilapidated one at that, and you have extrapolated from this single data point to reach an assessment of the entire Imperium? A ridiculous syllogism."

traits.locale_text: “你只见过一个农业世界，而且还是个残破不堪的农业世界。你打算基于这单一的数据，便妄加推断整个帝国的情况吗？何等荒谬的论证。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Ha visto un solo mundo agrícola que además estaba en ruinas, ¿y con ese único punto de referencia ha juzgado a todo el Imperium? Eso es un silogismo absurdo».
languages.original_text: "You have seen one agri-world, and a dilapidated one at that, and you have extrapolated from this single data point to reach an assessment of the entire Imperium? A ridiculous syllogism."

traits.locale_text: «Ha visto un solo mundo agrícola que además estaba en ruinas, ¿y con ese único punto de referencia ha juzgado a todo el Imperium? Eso es un silogismo absurdo».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「あなたはたった1つの農業惑星、それも荒廃したものを見ただけで、この1つのデータから帝国全体の評価をしたというのですか？馬鹿げた論法といえましょう」
languages.original_text: "You have seen one agri-world, and a dilapidated one at that, and you have extrapolated from this single data point to reach an assessment of the entire Imperium? A ridiculous syllogism."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたはたった1つの農業惑星、それも荒廃したものを見ただけで、この1つのデータから帝国全体の評価をしたというのですか？馬鹿げた論法といえましょう」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr habt eine Agrarwelt gesehen, die noch dazu heruntergekommen war, und aus diesem einen Datenpunkt extrapoliert Ihr die Beurteilung des gesamten Imperiums? Ein lächerlicher Syllogismus."
languages.original_text: "You have seen one agri-world, and a dilapidated one at that, and you have extrapolated from this single data point to reach an assessment of the entire Imperium? A ridiculous syllogism."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt eine Agrarwelt gesehen, die noch dazu heruntergekommen war, und aus diesem einen Datenpunkt extrapoliert Ihr die Beurteilung des gesamten Imperiums? Ein lächerlicher Syllogismus."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Vous voulez dire que vous vous êtes basée sur le seul monde que vous aviez vu jusque-là, c'est-à-dire un agri-monde délabré, pour vous faire une idée de l'Imperium ? Voilà un syllogisme des plus ridicules. »
languages.original_text: "You have seen one agri-world, and a dilapidated one at that, and you have extrapolated from this single data point to reach an assessment of the entire Imperium? A ridiculous syllogism."

traits.locale_text: « Vous voulez dire que vous vous êtes basée sur le seul monde que vous aviez vu jusque-là, c'est-à-dire un agri-monde délabré, pour vous faire une idée de l'Imperium ? Voilà un syllogisme des plus ridicules. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Bir tane zirai dünya gördün, üstelik harap hâldeydi ve bu tek veriyi aldın, çıkarımlar yaptın ve tüm İmparatorluk'a yönelik bir sonuca vardın. Absürt bir kıyas."
languages.original_text: "You have seen one agri-world, and a dilapidated one at that, and you have extrapolated from this single data point to reach an assessment of the entire Imperium? A ridiculous syllogism."

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
